prepare a canister of electrolytes solution with minerals and moisture.(makes 10 drinks)
LanguageData.AdRef_RecipeDefs_PrepareAlgaeKryllRaw.de: Prepare a portion of protein-rich pallets.(makes 5 algae raw)
LanguageData.AdRef_RecipeDefs_PrepareSynthMeal.label: create synth meal
LanguageData.AdRef_RecipeDefs_PrepareSynthMeal.descri: Synthesizes Algae-Kryll Goo and Electrolyte Solution into a reasonably edible meal. Not recommended for prolonged consumption.(makes 10 meals)
